name: finbar
headline: AI-powered financial data & analysis
description: Global financial data, available seconds after release. Cleaned tabular & time series data from 1000s of companies, maintained by proprietary ML, NLP, and OCR techniques. Seamless integration: update your model in 3 clicks, within 5 minutes of publication.

founders.name: Robin Gan, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and CTO at finbar.com.

Previous to this I worked on a globally deployed cloud-native banking platform at Thought Machine.

founders.name: Edward Huang, Founder
founders.description:
Founder and CEO at finbar. I wrote most of the MVP but now focus product and sales.
Previously I was a hedge fund analyst, and before that at Goldman Sachs. CFA charterholder.

generated_description:
**Finbar: A Quick Overview**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator Batch W25, Finbar is a London-based fintech startup that's shaking up the financial data space with its AI-powered solutions. In a world where information can feel like a deluge, Finbar stands out by offering global financial data that’s available mere seconds after its release. The aim? To deliver cleaned tabular and time series data from thousands of companies using advanced machine learning, natural language processing, and optical character recognition techniques.

What does that mean for you? In just three clicks, your financial models can be updated in under five minutes after new data goes live. It’s the kind of integration that enhances analytical efficiency and keeps you on the cutting edge.

With only a small team of two employees under the guidance of Group Partner Michael Seibel, the company is nimble and focused. Their ethos is reflected in their tagging as documents, fintech, finance, and workflow-automation — they’re all about making financial data more accessible and actionable.

Curious to learn more about how they're transforming financial data analysis? Explore their offerings at [Finbar's website](https://finbar.com). As they move forward, it will be intriguing to see how they leverage their innovative tech to redefine the financial landscape.
